archimate:Requirement.name: SC-42(1): Sensor Capability and Data | Reporting to Authorized Individuals or Roles
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Verify that the system is configured so that data or information collected by the [Assignment: organization-defined sensors] is only reported to authorized individuals or roles.

properties.value: In situations where sensors are activated by authorized individuals, it is still possible that the data or information collected by the sensors will be sent to unauthorized entities.
